Subject: Device does not show up in server console
Description:
Client installed from the executable generated from the server, with "correct" parameters (department not changed).
Network flow from client to server on TCP 443 is allowed and opened but client does not show up in server console and does not apply strategies.
Might be a certificate issue ? (server certificate was applied successfully)
What_We_Know__c:
- device - server issue was solved by the customer
- customer asked for SSH access since they are in an offline environment
- asked Aneta for SSH access
- the document was sent to the customer

- emails through Salfesforce are getting blocked, so I asked the customer from my email to whitelist it


2025.04.16:
Our DevOps prepared an image for the customer which contains port splitting for the ports which they requested.  The image was provided to the customer and they have successfully deployed the new EPP Server Appliance.
Next_Steps__c:
waiting on the customer to sign or decline

2025.04.16
The customer confirmed that the image which we provided to them works smoothly, we are waiting on their agreement to close the ticket.

2025.04.17:
Customer confirmed that case can be closed.
